rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Conceptual Photo is my world.  It wasn't before I took Elin's Class.  She may be a bit emotional, but what Artist isn't?  She changed my way of approaching materials and I will never be the same.  Changed for the betterment of Art.  Thanks Elin
Conceptual Photography. Don't know how you wouldn't love her. Challenging interesting reading and all around amazing class.

Professor Slavick is very energetic and smart.  she makes complex information interesting.  Her assginments are challenging and make you think, not just play with art materials.  I think I am a much better thinker about art-making for having been in her class
